title: Open today
creator_credit: Christopher Mylne and Scottish Tourist Board
brief_description: Made to celebrate the 45th year of Scotland’s Garden Scheme, the film shows a selection of gardens as far apart as Dalkeith, Ullspool and Wester Ross.
